DOC.brief_summary: This observational ( non-interventional ) study conduct characterize safety use CINRYZE routine clinical practice administer ( 1 ) routine prevention angioedema attack , ( 2 ) pre-procedure prevention angioedema attack , and/or ( 3 ) treatment angioedema attack .
DOC.brief_title: A European Post-Authorisation Observational Study Of Patients With Hereditary Angioedema
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria All patient must : Have diagnosis HAE receive CINRYZE prevention treatment angioedema attack Provide write informed consent/assent compliance applicable countryspecific local regulation Exclusion Criteria All patient must : Be receive CINRYZE investigational study Be receive another HAE therapy part clinical trial
